statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.35}+{6.43}\right)}={21.56}\approx{21.56}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.43}\cdot{3.84}={24.6912}\approx{24.7}.
